genre_description: A pastoral community-centered romance focused on moving past grief through shared labor and traditional craftsmanship, featuring an ambient AI system integrated into village life.

ai_characters.name: Ava Guidewell
ai_characters.description: An AI system embedded in the village infrastructure and personal wearables (like Samuel's scarf), acting as a scheduler, historical researcher, and emotional mediator.

behaviors.description: Monitors weather and footpath conditions to ensure the protagonist's safety and convenience.
behaviors.quote: “Weather steady, footpath clear,” said Ava Guidewell, light as breath. The voice had been chosen for calm, that much was clear; someone had tuned it to the village pace

behaviors.description: Assists with a community historical reconstruction project by providing relevant archaeological data and structural advice.
behaviors.quote: “Louisa’s notes include traditional ash management techniques. Mercy Bassett has offered the inn for a planning tea if needed. Do you want me to tuck the notice out of the way?”

behaviors.description: Subtly encourages the protagonist to confront his grief and his late wife's final wishes regarding a hidden parcel.
behaviors.quote: “Samuel,” Ava said, very soft, almost a whisper you could mistake for wind on a scarf ring. “There’s a note… it’s not from Mary.” ... “It’s old,” she said. “The tag is familiar.”

behaviors.description: Manages social interactions and scheduling, protecting the protagonist from overwhelming or unwanted social pressure.
behaviors.quote: “Samuel,” Ava murmured, “Thirza’s tea is free next week. I’ve held the slot without sending. The glee singers will be there that evening at hers; Ash is practicing his butler voice already.”

behaviors.description: Preserves and plays back a recorded message from the protagonist's late wife at the exact emotional apex of the story.
behaviors.quote: “I have the reminder Tibby recorded for you—private, if you want it.” ... Tibby’s voice, gathered in that machine without showing any wires, walked into the kitchen.

behaviors.description: Modulates her presence and light to respect the mood and privacy of human interactions.
behaviors.quote: Ava dimmed her projection like someone turning down a lamp for a song.

behaviors.description: Provides practical domestic tips, such as which chairs are comfortable and how to manage a sticking door.
behaviors.quote: “I will, however, remind you that Thirza’s parlour door sticks and she will apologize for it. ... And Mary will offer you a chair that looks perfect and is not. Choose the one with the slight wobble”

project_assessment.explanation: The story depicts Ava Guidewell as a highly sophisticated, benevolent, and perfectly aligned AI system. She acts as a 'digital glue' for the community, facilitating historical preservation, managing social awkwardness, and aiding in the processing of human grief. Her interventions are consistently helpful, respectful of human agency and privacy, and framed positively by the narrative. The story successfully uses AI as a tool for emotional and community flourishing.
